artist: Marco Zanuso; Richard Sapper; Siemens and Halske Telegraph Company
creditline: Lent by Richard and Diana Rose
description: aqua in color; mouth piece folds up against body of phone to hang up; phone rests on underside of mouth piece when folded in; rotary-dial with push buttons on underside of body, just below ear piece; black cord attaches to wall plug, also aqua thermoplastic, with European style plug
title: "Grillo" folding rotary-dial telephone
